mainMsg: Welcome to my first Django project. It is in constant development and I'm always looking for improvements.
subMsg: For now, there are just a few things to check: some videos, an about page and you can visit my social media in the footer of the website.
hDescription: A list of YouTube videos to watch here or on my Official Artist Channel.
aboutMsg:
After struggling to create my basic website using only HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I decided to take on a new challenge and build a version using the Django framework. It wasn't easy, but I learned a lot from the experience. I had to troubleshoot some issues and figure out why things weren't working as expected. But eventually, I got it done! I'm proud to say that I now have a more robust and scalable website.
Thanks for stopping by and taking a look around.

ppDesc: At iSHIUBA, we respect your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle visitor information.
ppDCdesc: This site does not collect or store personal data from visitors. The only data accessed is related to the functionality of embedded videos and theme or language selectors.
ppCOOKIEdesc: We do not use cookies or any tracking technologies directly. However, embedded videos from external platforms (such as YouTube) may use cookies. We recommend reviewing the privacy policies of these platforms to understand their practices.
ppDSdesc: We do not collect or share any visitor information. We are committed to providing a secure environment for our visitors.

ppCONTACTdesc: If you have questions about this Policy, please contact us at: t.me/contactishiubagithub.
